function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduction of urban air pollution due to lockdown measures","Impact":"Potential increase in O3 levels and change in pollutant concentrations","Mitigation":"Implement air quality monitoring and adjust policies for pollutant control","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, pollution control technologies","People":"Urban residents, individuals with respiratory conditions","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies"},{"Description":"Correlation between NO2 levels and COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data leading to inaccurate predictions and policy decisions","Mitigation":"Verify data accuracy and consider other relevant factors in outbreak analysis","Technologies":"Data verification tools, comprehensive analysis and modeling software","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, researchers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Influence of pollen on COVID-19 infections","Impact":"Potential impact of seasonal changes on infection rates","Mitigation":"Study and monitor the relationship between pollen levels and infection rates","Technologies":"Pollen monitoring systems, data analysis software","People":"Public health officials, researchers, allergy specialists","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"}]}
